Module bb.love_letter
Package bb.love_letter.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
bb.love_letter.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class provides an API to the Server for starting, and controlling the Game and also handles possible errors and invalid commands given by the Users.
Author:
Veronika Heckel, Philipp Keyzman, Muqiu Wang, Bence Ament

      Returns:
